      public void AddVertexBuffer(VertexBuffer vertexBuffer)
      sets the vertex buffer and adds the extra info associated with the layout of the vertex buffer
      Parameter:
      vertexBuffer - the vertex buffer to be added
      extraInfo - the extra info associated with the vertex buffer layout
